overview: Ami Je Tomari' is the love story of Amar and Jyoti. Amar and Jyoti belong to two rival families. They meet and fall in love. But their families don't accept their relationship. Jyoti gets pregnant. Her grandma gets her married to Amar and then they elope. Ajit who was supposed to marry Jyoti finds out about them and tries to harm them but fails. By this time their families have realized their mistake. They accept them and their son.
title: Ami Je Tomari
